Subject: Need to block the .exe files downloaded from internet but allowed if downloaded from Local server
Description:
The customer has a requirement that they need to block the .exe files downloaded from the internet but when we are downloading .exe from Local sever which has the private ip it should be blocked. So we just need to allow if the .exe files are downloaded from local server (Private IP range) and block .exe files downloaded over the internet.

Please suggest the procedure for the same, so the customer can meet their requirements
Solution_Comment__c: Resolved by explaining the customer how the product works.
